archimate:DataObject.name: HostingPlatformRequirementSpec
archimate:DataObject.documentation: HostingPlatformRequirementsSpec is used to represent the requirements that must be fulfilled by the platform on which the InstalledSoftware will run (e.g. compute; storage; network). The derived association /SoftwareSpecificatonRequires is used to document the set of requirements of a platform which can host the concerned software.
